# Introduction

RMarkdown file to accompany: *Evaluating the long-term phenological variability of river productivity,* a manuscript submitted to *Limnology and Oceanography* Special Issue on Changing Phenology in Aquatic Ecosystems.

Authors and affiliations: Nicholas S. Marzolf^1,\*^, Michael J. Vlah^1^, Weston M. Slaughter^1^, Emily S. Bernhardt^1^

^1^ Department of Biology, Duke University, Durham, NC, USA

* Corresponding author: nicholas.marzolf@duke.edu (ORCiD: 0000-0001-9146-1643)

To recreate this HTML, load the data files into a folder named 'Data' at the same path as the .rmd file, open the .rmd file, and click 'Knit'.
